mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_type_seq, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.del_yn, b.reg_dtm, b.reg_member_seq, b.update_dtm, b.update_member_seq, m.member_id reg_member_id FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON b.board_type_seq = bt.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON b.reg_member_seq = m.member_seq ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC LIMIT ${ph.offset}, ${ph.pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON b.board_type_seq = bt.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON b.reg_member_seq = m.member_seq

SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_type_seq, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.del_yn, b.reg_dtm, b.reg_member_seq, b.update_dtm, b.update_member_seq, m.member_id reg_member_id FROM board b JOIN board_type bt ON b.board_type_seq = bt.board_type_seq JOIN member m ON b.reg_member_seq = m.member_seq WHERE b.board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND b.board_type_seq = #{boardTypeSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_vote (board_seq, board_type_seq, member_seq, is_like, reg_dtm, ip) VALUES (#{boardSeq}, #{boardTypeSeq}, #{memberSeq}, #{isLike}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{ip})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO board (board_type_seq, title, content, reg_member_seq, reg_dtm) VALUES (#{boardTypeSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regMemberSeq}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title} , content = #{content} , update_member_seq = #{updateMemberSeq} , update_dtm = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND board_type_seq = #{boardTypeSeq}
